snippet: A 9 percent increase in December for the industry over all put the year’s sales at about 14.5 million vehicles, the best performance since 2007.
abstract: Automakers report that 2012 was their strongest sales year since 2007, posting solid December results and promising more growth in 2013; 9 percent increase in December for the industry overall put year’s sales at about 14.5 million vehicles.
lead_paragraph: A 9 percent increase in December for the industry over all put the year’s sales at about 14.5 million vehicles, the best performance since 2007.

headline.main: Automakers End 2012 With Sales at 5-Year High
headline.print_headline: Automakers End 2012 With Sales at 5-Year High
